readable.content: A lady holds a little girl who is trying to catch bubbles . A woman is holding a little girl who is trying to catch bubbles . A woman with holding a young girl playing with bubbles at a picnic . A young woman in a blue shirt stands , holding a young girl in a denim dress . There is a woman holding her baby daughter while the daughter claps .
